description: This bangle is a testament to the timeless beauty of South Indian jewelry. The combination of Emeralds and Rubies is considered auspicious, bestowing blessings and prosperity. The unique filigree design and openwork design make this piece both traditional and modern. High-quality materials ensure a long-lasting heirloom piece.
